relevance_explanation: The routine was correctly trimmed based on the customer's account type (TRADITIONAL_IRA) and client level (PREMIUM). The irrelevant step 4a (Apply Address Hold) which is only applicable for STANDARD client level was removed. The tool call `get_account_type_extra` was replaced with the direct value.
completeness_explanation: The trimmed routine includes all necessary steps and logic applicable to the customer. All relevant steps are preserved.
